SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Operating Mode" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_OPERATING_MODE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Home Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOME_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_HOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Groups" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_SERVER_GRPS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_JB_APP_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Tool" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AIOPS_TOOLS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: IF &UC4RB_AIOPS_TOOLS# EQ "SSH" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_SSH_PARAM : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AIOPS_TOOLS# EQ "WinRM" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_WINRM_CONNECTION_DETAILS : ENDIF : ENDIF
